name: Snake Pass
description: Slither, coil and climb your way to the top of Haven Tor in this one of a kind physics based, puzzle platform adventure from award winning independent studio Sumo Digital!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8/10 (64-bit OS required) Processor: Intel Core i5-750 2.68Ghz / AMD II x4 945 3.0Ghz or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560 2GB/AMD Radeon 6870 HD 2GB or equivalent (Integrated graphics not supported) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
